p: An analysis of the main components (PCA) was performed to find out whether there was a correlation between the variables, in order to find the minimum number of factors or components that can explain the maximum percentage of information provided by the variables involved in this analysis. The variables were: % of relative areas for each compound, antioxidant activity (Î¼mol TE/mL for both methods DPPH and ABTS) and antimicrobial activity for each strain according to the method of inhibition zone reported for each of the oils under study (F1, F2, F3, F4, Unoil, and Ooil).
